Name: A Dog Named Mato
About the game: A dog named Mato is a brave dog in an inverted world where you need to solve puzzles by rotating and walking on walls and ceilings. Features of the game: Mato loves to run and bark. Mato barks and jumps. Mato can rotate the level. Mato can switch levers. Mato can teleport.
